definition: abbr. for 揚州|扬州[Yang2 zhou1]/surname Yang
to raise/to hoist/the action of tossing or winnowing/scattering (in the wind)/to flutter/to propagate
abbr. for 揚州|扬州[Yang2 zhou1]/surname Yang
to raise/to hoist/the action of tossing or winnowing/scattering (in the wind)/to flutter/to propagate

sentences.english: Snow there were numerous underground night.
sentences.chinese: 雪纷纷扬扬地下了一夜。

sentences.english: Peach on a rainy night, you are still a few light spondee Petals that you have?
sentences.chinese: 桃花夜雨，你还在灯下数那纷纷扬扬的落花么？

sentences.english: To the winter snow, snowflakes have a spondee to the next.
sentences.chinese: 到了银装素裹的冬天，雪花纷纷扬扬的下了一地。

sentences.english: The flying snowflakes have put heavy coats on the trees of the city ring park.
sentences.chinese: 纷纷扬扬的大雪给环城公园的树木穿上了“棉衣”。

sentences.english: Memory is dust, swirl tells the past in the air.
sentences.chinese: 记忆是尘，纷纷扬扬在空气里诉说着过往。

definition: to float down/to fall gently (snowflakes, leaves etc)
(of snow etc) to fill the sky
goose feather snow (idiom)/big heavy snow fall
lit. to fill the whole sky/everywhere/as far as the eye can see
to swirl in the air (of thickly falling snowflakes, flower petals etc)/to flutter about
snow/snowfall/CL:場|场[chang2]/to have the appearance of snow/to wipe away, off or out/to clean
lit. to fill the whole sky and cover the land; everywhere/as far as the eye can see
very slight sound/rustling (onom.)/to stream down (of tears)/luxuriant growth (of vegetation)
